Name: Witches of the Fourth  1v1
About the game: EARLY ACCESS Package is named the Hollows Chapter 1 Because that was the Name I Originally wanted for the Game But i Changed It The Witches of the Fourth is a 1v1 Versus Multiplayer Spell casting Witch Hunt Where You Battle Your Friends to Collect there Souls Using Magical Abilities and Powerups like Fireballs, Soul Orbs , Teleporting , Exploding Rocks , Spell Books, The Player With the Most Souls Wins March the 5th 2022 You Play as One of the two Sisters Jinx or Hex Both Powerful Witches With Extraordinary abilities One Good Witch and one Bad Witch You Choose Hex Is An Earth Witch That Uses Earth Magic And is Guided By the Earths Natural Core Elements Jinx is a Spirit Witch That Uses Spirit Magic and Is Ruled By the Crying Souls From the Depths Of Hell Features -1v1 Multiplayer -Fps Spell Casting -Different Abilities and Power Ups -Enchanting Atmosphere -Ultimate Abilities
